ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: To promote theatre movement in Manipur, to revive and preserve Manipuri Folk Music, Folk dance and Folk drama. To set up institutions to provide training in the field of theatre, actorâ€™s training, study of stage-craft and production of plays. To encourage and assist production of new plays by awarding prizes etc. For the past 40 years, LAC has continuously strived to achieve a high standard of theatre production and this has reaped rich dividends in the form of various awards, laurels won by the Centre. Without discarding the traditional theatre style of Manipur.So far, LAC has produced over 70 plays of different genre. The flagship play of LAC Khongjom Laan was chosen by the AIR Imphal and DDK Imphal for broadcasting and telecasting every year on the auspicious Khongjom Day, 23rd April. LAC has participated in international and national level drama competitions and has won many awards.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Since before the registration of our NGO (Manipur Development Bureau), our micro finance section has been lending money as a loan to the trainees. As a suggestion our NGO has divided into two factors for trainees i) Rural area ii)Urban area. The trained and experienced trainees were formed a number of Self help Groups (SHG) under the head of the Trust for promoting income generation and Self reliance and it is also a source that the trainees were to apply loan from our NGO/ new scheme for setting up of their home unit and other self help business. The Manipur Development Bureau (MDB) conducted and gave a knowledge to trainees and expend an amount Rs 572,690/-(five lakh) seventy two thousand &six hundred and ninety)only in the year 2008 to the end of 31st March, 2009 and to expend an amount of Rs.713,180/-(seven lakhs thirteen thousand one hundred and eighty)only in the year 2009 to the end of 31st March 2010 and then to expend an amount of Rs. 1,018,300/- (ten lakhs and eighteen thousand three hundred ) only in the year 2010 to 2011 to the end of 31st March 2011 . In the year 2008 to the end of the 31stMarch 2009, our NGO has collected an amount of Rs.750045/-(seven lakh fifty thousand and forty rupees) only. Our office has invested only the amount of Rs. 572,690/-. Total collected amount Rs.(750045-572,690)=Rs.1,77355/-(one lakh seventy seven thousand three hundred and fifty five)only. In the year 2009, we have collected an amount o Rs .975000/-(nine lakh seventy five thousand)only up to at the end of 31st March 2010. We have invested only an amount of Rs. 713,180. Total collected amount Rs.( 975000- 713,180)=Rs.261820/-(Two lakh sixty one thousand eight hundred and twenty)only. And then we have collected an amount of Rs. 1325000/-(thirteen lakh twenty five thousand )only at the end of 31st March 2011 but the investment amount is Rs. 1,018,300 . Total collected amount Rs.( 1325000-1,018,300)=Rs.306700/-(Three lakh sixty seven thousand)only. The last three years the total profit we have collected is Rs.745875/-(seven lakh forty five thousand eight hundred and seventy five)only out of the amount we have invested to the trainees i.e an amount of Rs.2304170/-(twenty three lakh four hundred one hundred and seventy)only. We have conducted Embroidery/Tailoring program at the training site of the Trust before we have to finance to the Trainees. Not only this program we have taken a program of local dry fish food called Ngari, handicrafts, Handloom, self help group, Live stock and even local jewelry program, agricultural farming and others like animal husbandry. Some time we have financed after with due care at the area of city shops and even big hotels. We get a good achievement about the finance from the trainees of cattle rearing, piggery and chicken centre. We have also financed to the trainees of farmers (paddy field) in our area.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: The Major activities of this Union is only Theatre/Drama works only. The Union is running Drama Training Institute (DTI) specially on Make-up course since 1985 which is produced many make-up artist in the state. The Union is also running a Yoga class since 1997. As this Union is the oldest theatre organization in the state many artists had been come up their career from this Union. Above all this Union organized number of workshops, seminars and symposium especially in theatre and drama from time to time. This Union had won many Best production awards at National and State Level Drama Festivals/competitions. Some them are as mentioned below : (1) "Haorang Leishang Saphabee" at National Drama Festival, Delhi -1954; (2) "Ningol Chapter One" in All Manipur Drama Festival -1955; (3) "Kege Lamja" at All Manipur Folk Drama Festival-1958; (4) "Alexander" in All Manipur Drama Festival -1964; (5) "Meitei Khunggang" in All Manipur Drama Competition - 1969; (6) "Chooti" in All Manipur Drama Festival - 1975; (7) "Harichandra Vs Viswamitra" in All India Short Play competition, Allahabad - 1985; (8)"Lamkhei Wathok" in All Manipur Short Play Competition -1989 and in All India short play competition, Allahabad-1990; (9) â€œShinnaidabini Nungdi Sanarembiâ€ at All Manipur Short Play competition-1994 and at All India short play competition, Allahabad -1995; (10) â€œKakkhraba Kokyamâ€ at All India short play competition, Munger, Bihar, 1997; (11) â€œHingminnashiâ€ at All Manipur short play competition â€“ 1998 and All India short play competition â€“ 1999; (12) â€œMeekap Thokloâ€ at All India short play competition, â€“ 2000 and All India short play competition, Allahabad â€“ 2001; (13) â€œImaâ€ at All Manipur Short play competition â€“ 2005. etcâ€¦

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: One of the most active institutes of performing arts in Manipur the institute has been appreciated in and outside Manipur not only for its own compositions of traditional Manipuri dances of Raas Leela like Maharas Vasantaraas Divaraas Nityaraas Kunjaraas Lai haraoba and tribal dances but also for its creative compositions on contemporary thems Under the tutelage of its founder member M. Thoiba Singh and Pradhan Guru Smt. Lata Thounaojam who is also the first among the Manipuri female choreographers having recieved formal training in Choreography the institute has also earned a distinction for its compositions like Nachom on National Integration. Hey manipur on communal harmony in the state Poirei Chanurasing Meekap thokle on womens emancipation movement with reference to Manipuri women Abhisar based on song of Rabindra Sangeet Abhiram Prasanga Dance Drama Eklavya Dance Drama including a number of compositions for school children in addition to its much acclaimed Chakpa Jagoi a composition of Chakpa dances and various compositions of tribal dances. Committed to imparting knowledge of traditional performing arts of Manipur to the younger generations the institute has visited many places of India and abroad within till date Organising of seminars and workshops on the traditional dance and music of Manipur is one area the centre has seriously proposed to take up from time to time

ngoList.title: Sangeet Kala Sangam
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: The Sangeet Kala Sangam is a cultural institution set up by a group of artistes of different bachground of Dance,Music, Theatre and Martial Arts with a view to undertake various activities for promotion of art & culture with its objects 1. to propogate and spread the knowledge of Manipuri art and culture in its pristine purity specially in dance, drama and music among the people of Manipur and other states of India. 2. to preserve the secred treasur of Manipuri art and culture. 3. to do continous reserch work in all dpartment of Manipuri culture 4. to revive and preserve folk music/dance/folk drama 5. to forster cultural contracts between hills and palin of Manipur and also with other states of India in the fields od dance, music and drama etc. Since inception the Sangeet Kala Sangam produced many folk and classical dance productions during the decades. Some important dance may be mentioned as Fungarel, Hiri Konba, Nongpok Wanglen Khongdarol, Loyalakpa Kumdamlon, Chakpa Haraoba Dance( a research product), Basanta Rash(a classical based on Lord Krishna) etc.. Till now this institution has pariticipated many dance / drama competition organised by the Government Organisation and Non Government organisation throughout the country and won prizes. It has been giving many cultural programmes performance throughout the country like in the India International Trade Fair, Pragadi Maidan New Delhi for Manipur State Day organised by the Government of Manipur.Above and all, it gives its dance and drama production as its own and also in the DDK,Guwahati & Imphal periodically as part of its development of art and culture and preservation of cultural Heritage.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: SMILE TRAIN SHIJA CLEFT PROJECT Providing free operation to patients with cleft lip and palate under the sponsorship of Smile Train Inc., USA, through Shija Hospitals and Research Institute Pvt. Ltd., as sister concern of Shija Health Care and Research Institute (SHCRI). The Smile Train Project started on 9th June 2006 and has successfully operated more than 3500 patients free of cost. We have been working on ensuring that the benefit of the project reaches to the masses of the North-Eastern part of India & even to the extent of Myanmar. Mission Myanmar on 23rd 24th &25th of May 2013 and on 20th 21st 22nd of March 2014. Where in 87 & 27 free cleft surgeries were respectively performed successfully. Various initiatives that have been undertaken till date are listed below: - Mission Barak. - Mission Nagaland. - Mission Ukhrul. - Mission Senapati. - Mission Myanmar. - Mission Churachandpur. SHIJA BLOOD BANK & TRANSFUSION SERVICES Shija Blood Bank & Transfusion Services is the only licensed blood bank accredited by the National Accreditation Board for Hospitals & Healthcare Providers (NABH) in North Eastern states. It is equipped with Nucleic Acid Test (NAT) facility to screen HIV, Hepatitis B & C Virus which is the first installation in the entire Eastern India. SHIJA VITAMIN ANGELS PROJECT It is a project to provide free Vitamin A supplements and Albendazole to all children between 6 months and 5 years of age. Implemented effectively from January 2015. It is a collaborative effort of Shija Health Care and Research Institute (SHCRI) and Vitamin Angels, a US based NGO, and a simple cost effective dose of vitamin A every six months can prevent blindness and reduce under-five child mortality by 24% in at risk populations. Vitamin A Deficiency (VAD) is the most common cause of preventable blindness in children under five and reduction of VAD has a vital role in maintaining eye health and vision, growth, and immune function. Free Vitamin A for children between 6 months and 5 years and Albendazole for children between 1 year and 5 years is distributed in various camps and are also available on all days at Shija Hospitals & Research Institute, HealthCity Langol. SHIJA VITAMIN ANGELS PROJECT has distributed 948 bottles of Vitamin A (100,000 IU) (1 bottle =500 doses), 960 bottles of Vitamin A (200,000 IU) (1 bottle =500 doses) and 858 bottles of Albendazole (400 mg) (1 bottle =500 doses) till date. SHIJA EYE CARE FOUNDATION Founded: Year 2007 Shija Eye Care Foundation has operated more than 20000 cataract surgeries till date. We also conduct various Eye Screening camp on the average of 7 to 8 camps per month in rural and remote areas of Manipur to cater the underserved region. The detected patients for surgeries especially the cataracts are provided transportation to and from base hospital, free stay for two nights . Shija Eye Care Foundation-an initiative (Mission for Vision â€“ Myanmar) held from 25/12/ 2013 to 29/12/ 2013where in 179 cataract surgeries were performed free of cost by a team from Shija Eye Care Foundation at Monywa General Hospital, Sagaing region. Shija Eye Care Foundation has been contributing the 60% to 70% of cataract surgeries from the total 30000 operable cases of Manipur. But the overall backlog is increasing by years as we cannot operate more then 3500-4000 per year. Shija Eye Care Foundation also has been certified for cornea transplantation by Directorate of Health Services Manipur on 22nd April 2016.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: The SKY Hospital and Research Centre Private Limited Imphal is the only full-fledged heart hospital in Manipur with both Interventional Cardiology and Open Heart Surgery (CTVS) facilities. Free services rendered by the Hospital are: 1. Provided free OPD and Echocardiography screening of 387 children below 18 years of age. 2. Conducted Free Cathlab procedures for "Non-operative Closure Hole in the Heart" (CHD) in respect of 21 BPL children (ASD Device Closure: 8; PDA Device Closure: 13). 3. Performed subsidised Cathlab procedures (50% subsidy) for 49 heart patients belonging to Economically Weaker Sections (EWS) of society and general public. 4. conducted free heart surgeries in respect of 33 heart patients belonging to BPL families. 5. Official partners of National Health Mission in Manipur state for free treatment of congenital Heart Diseases (CHD) of children under Rashtriya Bal Swasthya Karyakaram (RBSK) program. 6. Assisted by NEC for procurement of advanced medical devices and equipment for providing state of the art facilities for treatment of heart diseases.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: NEC Project on Procurement of Advanced Medical Devices and Equipment (10% State share)

ngoList.title: SNEHA BHAVAN
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: SNEHA BHAVAN IS A NON-GOVERMRNTAL OGANISTION.I t was established in 1994 for the female drug user,alchoholic,widow affected/infected with HIV/AIDS and their children. sneha bhavan organized various programmes and activites for the drug users so that they may adopt positive life style.The activites are vocation training like:weaving,tailoring,flowermaking,basketmaking,pillow designing,purse making,poultry,piggery etc.The organization olso conducted sensitization of different community leaders on women empowering,health hygiene,their legal right and the educational support of the children.The organization is presently focusing on the most affected five districts of the state ie chandal,Imphal west,Imphal east.thoubal,charachumpur.Since 2010 , the orgnisation has not less than 7-10 children passing higher secondary and senior higher secondary every year.The organization is giving treatment to more than 180-190 females drugs addicts and alcoholics every year.The organistion also reached out to more than 1000 families through CHAHA project.The oganisation receives help from VIDES international for the children education.Sneha Bhavan de-addiction and rehabilitation is sponsord by the Ministry of Justice and Empowerment,Government of India from 1998-1999.Those who lose job due to alcoholic where place back to their job.Many Women are living quality life through vocational training , self help group, through treatment.
